mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user(userid,userpw,name, phone,email,zipcode, address1, address2) VALUES(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET userpw = #{userpw}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT userpw FROM tbl_user WHERE userid = #{userid}
